actions.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment extends the provisions that exempt Amtrak from the Americans with Disabilities Act until 1998 and transfers title to magnetic levitation track materials to the State of Florida.
purpose: An amendment to extend the provisions that exempt Amtrak from the Americans with Disabilities Act until 1998 and to transfer title of magnetic levitation track materials to the State of Florida.
